articles.author: Adrian Croft
articles.title: ‘Significantly impacted’: World’s biggest brewers tally costs of coronavirus outbreak as beer sales suffer
articles.description: The world's biggest beermakers were counting on a big sales lift from their China businesses this year. And then the coronavirus pandemic hit.

articles.author: eamonbarrett
articles.title: Coronavirus prompts the world’s gambling capital to do the unthinkable: close its casinos
articles.description: “Of course this was a difficult decision."

articles.author: Naomi Xu Elegant
articles.title: Hong Kong protests birthed a new hospital worker union. The coronavirus has prompted its first strike
articles.description: Workers are promising a third day of strikes on Wednesday.

articles.author: Ian Mount
articles.title: OPEC nerves grow as coronavirus forces China to slash oil imports
articles.description: Crude prices sunk below $50 a barrel for the first time in more than a year on Monday.

articles.author: Claire Zillman, reporter
articles.title: Hong Kong reports its 1st coronavirus death, the 2nd outside mainland China
articles.description: The death puts more pressure on the city's leader to close travel routes to the mainland.

articles.author: Don Reisinger
articles.title: Coronavirus will take a bite out of Apple’s iPhone business. The question facing analysts: ‘How big?’
articles.description: iPhone's sales could falter over the coronavirus, one prominent Apple analyst says. What do others think?
